## ResourceHandler.save() method

Save custom resources into the files map.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
save(files: Map<string, Blob>): Promise<string[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  files | Map&lt;string, Blob&gt; | the data files in the package |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string\[\]&gt;

the list of top-level resources to write into datapackage.json::resources
